text:
As organizations utilize generative AI for 
various use cases such as customer service

summarization and content creation the need 
for implementing safeguards customized to your

application requirements and responsible AI 
policies is even more critical Amazon Bedrock

guard rails is the only responsible AI capability 
offered by a major cloud provider that helps you

build and customize safeguards towards safety 
privacy and truthfulness for your generative

AI applications within a single solution 
guardrails blocks up to 88% multimodal

content by providing added protection on top 
of the Native safeguards provided by Foundation

models with Amazon Bedrock guard rails you can 
configure safeguards to filter malicious content

Define topics and specific words to be denied 
redact sensitive information such as pii and help

block hallucinations using contextual ground in 
checks and automated reasoning checks guardrails

also protects against prompt attacks including 
prompt injections and jailbreaks for increased

protection that end users can rely upon guardrail 
supports all Foundation models available on Amazon

bedrock and other fine-tuned open- source and 
self-hosted models outside Bedrock build trusted

secure and responsible generative AI applications 
with Amazon Bedrock guard rails learn more
